data.name: Dunjungle
data.detailed_description:
Overview


Dunjungle is an action-packed roguelite about an ape adventuring into the depths of the jungle, stopping at nothing to find his beloved human friend who went exploring and never returned (probably looking for treasure, the greedy fool).



You'll explore continuously changing dungeons, temples, crypts, and other mysterious places, where you'll find all sort of weird enemies and lots of weapons and spells you can combine for a different experience every time.

Not all creatures are hostile! Along your way, you may find characters who are lost, trapped, or maybe just chilling in there. Help them out, and you might become friends!

The Game Loop

There are no checkpoints in Dunjungle. You die, you start over. Die again, try again!


BUT, don't worry too much! Several things will remain for your next run.
Maybe you unlocked a new weapon? Maybe a new spell? Maybe you saved a trapped character, who will now lend you a hand.

More importantly, each time you die, you'll know more about Dunjungle's world, so don't despair, and use what you've learned to get further on your next adventure!
Are you up to the challenge?

Features


Lots of weapons, spells and relics with unique effects.


Weapons and spells can also be merged with several elements, to create new and powerful versions.
Burn monsters with fire, use ice to slow them down, shock them with thunder, or just get them off you using wind to blow them away!

Dungeons are procedurally generated, made from big collection of hand-crafted rooms.


These rooms are filled with all sort of weird creatures, valuable treasures, dangerous traps, and of course, challenging bosses!

'Scientific illustration' styled creature compendium.


You'll find many notes from a mysterious explorer lost in the dungeons, with detailed drawings of the creatures that inhabit them, plus a lot of information on their behaviour and tips on how to deal with them!
Will you collect them all?

And more!


  • Pixel art!
  • Irrelevant item descriptions!
  • Monkeys!
  • Annoying NPCs who think they're better than you!
  • Weird fishes with legs!
  • All food is vegan!



You can get in touch with me in the Dunjungle Discord: https://discord.gg/cex35BcPYh
Keep in mind that it's only me working on Dunjungle, but I'll do my best to listen to your feedback and answer any questions!

data.short_description: A 2d action-packed roguelite about an ape adventuring into a mysterious jungle to find his lost human friend. Explore ever-changing dungeons, fight weird enemies and gear up with lots of weapons you can combine for a new experience every run. Explore, fight, die, and repeat!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7+
  • Processor: 2.13GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB VRAM
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10+
  • Processor: 2.13GHz
  • Memory: 1 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB VRAM
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
